title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API that lets you pull, run, and chat with 70+ open-source models (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …) on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async wrapper for the Ollama REST API; install via `pip install ollama`.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; on npm as `ollama`.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (`langchain-ollama`) exposing Ollama models, embeddings, and tool-calling for LangChain chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now “Open WebUI”)—chat history, RAG, multi-user, model manager, Docker image ready.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation persistence, and keybindings inspired by `sqlite`.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; Maven Central artifact `io.github.ollama4j:ollama4j`.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem (`gem install ollama`) wrapping the HTTP API with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK published as `OllamaSharp` on NuGet; supports chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset—use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made `docker-compose.yml` and CUDA/ROCm Dockerfiles for headless server installs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit; clone & `pip install -r requirements.txt` to run.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands with per-user quotas.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an “Ask Ollama” modal for inline Q&A and note summarization using local models.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community node for n8n workflow automation—chat, generate text, or create embeddings with Ollama inside no-code flows.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module that spins up Ollama service containers for integration tests against LLM calls in pipelines.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of community Modelfiles for fine-tuned and niche models not yet in the official library.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tools, integrations, troubleshooting, and benchmarks around the Ollama ecosystem.
